flawed_nl_solution:
The time the singer had for singing was 80 - 10 = <<80-10=70>>70 minutes.
The time the singer had for singing 5-minute songs was 70 - 10 = 40 minutes.
The number of 5-minute songs was 40 / 5 = <<40/5=8>>8 songs.
The total number of songs sung is 8 + 1 = <<8+1=9>>9 songs.
#### 9

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 60, not 40. It appears there was a miscalculation with the digits before the final zero.
